version_description:
- added support of animated stickers
- support "add friends nearby"
- performance updates
- optimize battery usage
- fixed push notification problems

- Incorporated features of official Telegram App v5.10: Silent Messages, Group Admin Titles and Slow Mode
- User Interface improvements
- Fixed login problem
- Updated technical support contacts
- Various bugfixes

SCHEDULED MESSAGES
• Hold the 'Send' button and select 'Schedule Message' to automatically send something at a specified time.
• Schedule reminders for yourself in the 'Saved Messages' chat.
• Get a notification when any of your scheduled message

Revgram now supports iOS 13
- Fixed various issues in iOS 13
- Performance Improvement

Note: From this version, Revgram will no longer support iOS 8.

v5.14 comes with the following updates:
- new advanced theme editor
- schedule messages to be sent when your recipient comes online
- redesigned interface for sharing your location
- adjusted size of text throughout the app
- support Apple

Sticker Directory
• Access a catalog of over 20,000 stickers made by professional artists from the updated Sticker Panel by tapping the ‘+’ icon.
• Use sticker search to find the stickers you're looking for – or scroll from the latest packs all the

New Media Editor, Better GIFs, and More

Media Editor
• Tap the brush icon when sending a photo or video to access the media editor.
• Enhance media quality, tweak parameters like brightness, saturation, etc.
• Add drawings, text, or sticke
